title: One Bedroom,  Attached Garage, Pool, Easy Access to Shopping & Dining
map_address: 1465 Red Hawk Drive, Leasing Office near Wolfensberger Road
posting_body: ['Come Home', 'Come home to The Highlands at Red Hawk in Castle Rock, CO.', 'Here, you can dive into a lifestyle that brings you ongoing relaxation and convenience.', 'We offer 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments, and 3 bedroom apartments that are complete with everything you need to feel right at home.', 'Our location gives you the power to experience downtown Castle Rock, the surrounding Denver area, and the best local attractions in Douglas County.', 'You will love having easier commutes and better travel with close access to I-25.', 'Our floor plans are highlighted by stunning features and finishes and provide you with breathtaking mountain views.', 'Discover spectacular community amenities such as a state-of-the-art fitness center, shimmering swimming pool, sun deck, and beyond.', 'With gorgeous landscaping and the right combination of apartment features, our community is one of a kind.', 'Join The Highlands at Red Hawk today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 824 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Washer & Dryer in each Apartment', '- Granite Countertops', '- Pantry*', '- Electric Fireplace*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Designer Backsplash', '- Designer Fixtures and Finishes', '- Walk-in Shower with Custom Tile', '- Breakfast Bars', '- Walk-in Closets*', '* Select Units Only', 'Community Amenities', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Attached Garage', '- Guest Parking', '- Easy Access to Shopping and Dining', '- On-Site Management', '- Breathtaking Views', '- Public Parks Nearby', '- State-of-the-Art Fitness Center', '- Clubhouse', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Shimmering Swimming Pool', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'Up to 2 pets per apartment.', 'Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Pet Deposit.', 'Non-refundable pet fee.', 'See your community office for more details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Income must be no less than 2.5X of Lease Rate', 'Driving Directions', 'From I-25 take the Wolfensberger Road exit and head West.', 'Turn Right on Red Hawk Drive.', 'The property is on your left.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Highlands at Red Hawk', '1465 Red Hawk Drive, Castle Rock, CO, 80109', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '3Q92n9qe']
